name: chrome-webstore-update-item
friendlyName: Update a package on Chrome Web Store
description: Upload a package to update an existing store item
author: Momentum Dashboard Corp.
instanceNameFormat: Update a package on Chrome Web Store

inputs.name: itemId
inputs.label: Item Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Item Id of the Web Extension on the Chrome Store

inputs.name: clientId
inputs.label: Client Id
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The App Client ID for signing requests.
Example: 12345678901-1lorum2ipsum3dolor4sit5amet.apps.googleusercontent.com

inputs.name: clientSecret
inputs.label: Client Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The App Client Secret for signing requests.
Example: a1bcdE2FgHiJ3klMNopQRstU

inputs.name: refreshToken
inputs.label: Refresh Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Refresh token for Chrome Web Store API

inputs.name: packageToPublish
inputs.label: Package to publish
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder or file path to publish. This can be a fully-qualified path or a path relative to the root of the repository. Wildcards are not supported. [Variables](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=550988) are supported. Example: $(Build.ArtifactStagingDirectory)
